posts.post_content:
Time to pay for my sons college.  Here is what I have and I can get you better photos if needed than the ones in my photobucket.  Paypal friends and family would be cheapest, but if you want to be safe, you can cover the fees.  I put prices on each.  If it seems too high, them I probably paid too much myself.  Thanks for looking.
